step.title: pfSense Traffic Shaper Wizard
step.description: This wizard will guide you through setting up the pfSense traffic shaper.

field.name: Next
field.warning: Going any further will wipe your existing shaper config! If you do not wish to continue, please click the pfSense logo at the top to return to the webConfigurator.

step.title: pfSense Traffic Shaper Wizard
step.description: WAN connection speed - Please note that the wizard will automatically subtract 20% for the queues.

field.name: Inside
field.description: Inside interface for shaping your download speeds
field.typehint: This is usually the LAN interface

field.name: Download
field.description: The download speed of your WAN link in Kbits/second.

field.name: Outside
field.description: Outside interface for shaping your upload speeds
field.typehint: This is usually the WAN interface

field.name: Upload
field.description: The upload speed of your WAN link in Kbits/second.

step.title: pfSense Traffic Shaper Wizard

field.name: Enable
field.description: This will raise the priority of VOIP traffic above all other traffic.

field.name: Provider
field.description: Choose Generic if your provider isn't listed.

field.name: Bandwidth
field.typehint: Total bandwidth guarantee for VOIP phone(s)

step.title: pfSense Traffic Shaper Wizard

field.name: Enable
field.description: This will lower the priority of P2P traffic below all other traffic. Please check the items that you would like to prioritize lower than normal traffic.

field.name: Aimster
field.typehint: Aimster and other P2P using the Aimster protocol and ports

field.name: BitTorrent
field.typehint: Bittorrent and other P2P using the Torrent protocol and ports, set your client to use port 50000-55000 for random data ports.

field.name: BuddyShare
field.typehint: BuddyShare and other P2P using the BuddyShare protocol and ports

field.name: CuteMX
field.typehint: CuteMX and other P2P using the CuteMX protocol and ports

field.name: DCplusplus
field.typehint: DC++ and other P2P using the DC++ protocol and ports

field.name: DirectConnect
field.typehint: DirectConnect and other P2P using the DirectConnect protocol and ports

field.name: DirectFileExpress
field.typehint: DirectFileExpress and other P2P using the DirectFileExpress protocol and ports

field.name: eDonkey2000
field.typehint: eDonkey and other P2P using the eDonkey protocol and ports

field.name: FastTrack
field.typehint: FastTrack and other P2P using the FastTrack protocol and ports

field.name: Gnutella
field.typehint: Gnutella and other P2P using the Gnutella protocol and ports

field.name: grouper
field.typehint: grouper and other P2P using the grouper protocol and ports

field.name: hotComm
field.typehint: hotComm and other P2P using the hotComm protocol and ports

field.name: HotlineConnect
field.typehint: HotlineConnect and other P2P using the HotlineConnect protocol and ports

field.name: iMesh
field.typehint: iMesh and other P2P using the iMesh protocol and ports

field.name: Napster
field.typehint: Napster and other P2P using the Napster protocol and ports

field.name: OpenNap
field.typehint: OpenNap and other P2P using the OpenNap protocol and ports

field.name: Scour
field.typehint: Scour and other P2P using the Scour protocol and ports

field.name: Shareaza
field.typehint: Shareaza and other P2P using the Shareaza protocol and ports

field.name: SongSpy
field.typehint: SongSpy and other P2P using the SongSpy protocol and ports

field.name: WinMX
field.typehint: WinMX and other P2P using the WinMX protocol and ports

step.title: pfSense Traffic Shaper Wizard

field.name: Enable
field.description: This will raise the priority of gaming traffic to higher than most traffic.

field.name: BattleNET
field.typehint: Battle.net - Virtually every game from Blizzard publishing should match this. This includes the following game series: Starcraft, Diablo, Warcraft. Guild Wars also uses this port.

field.name: Battlefield2
field.typehint: Battlefield 2 - this game uses a LARGE port range, be aware that you may need to manually rearrange the resulting rules to correctly prioritize other traffic.

field.name: Everquest
field.typehint: Everquest - this game uses a LARGE port range, be aware that you may need to manually rearrange the resulting rules to correctly prioritize other traffic.

step.title: pfSense Traffic Shaper Wizard

field.name: Enable
field.description: This will help raise or lower the priority of other protocols higher than most traffic.

field.name: PPTP
field.typehint: Microsoft Point to Point tunneling protocol

field.name: HTTP
field.typehint: HTTP and HTTPS aka Web Traffic

step.title: pfSense Traffic Shaper Wizard
step.description:
After pressing Finish the system will load the new profile.
Please note that this may take a moment.
Also note that the traffic shaper is stateful meaning that only new connections will be shaped.
If this is an issue please reset the state table after loading the profile.
